description:
Like:
Looks a lot like pokemon gba games I
grew up playing, music that ve heard so far
sounds good, and I like a couple of the 
starting mons designs quite a bit.

improvements i'd like to see:
an option to play as a girl.
touchscreen controls for linux phones.
ability to fullscreen the game.
bugs / crashes fixes especially at the end of the 
first battle.
Seems like a nice game, but I crash in battles and in grass. 4 stars because it might be steam os related.

I like this game but there are a few things that probably aren't supposed to happen. I have infinite money (unless i can go in debt), grinding is just annoying, and if you tell Nurse Joy to heal your Tuxemon, when she tells you to give her a second, you can move around. This means that if you sprint, you can run out, and your Tuxemon get healed anyways. It also stores the healing popup to appear in specific rooms. Like say, a hospital. The cafe where you get Tuxepedia also lets the storage happen. They still give you a second, and you can use that time to run to the textbox trigger. Now, when its done, you're softocked.
Great work on a super game but always crashes on first battle and can't get past this
In "Tuxemon: spyder and the cathedral" the game goes down when I use the "Boulder" Attack with Rockitten.

a ver... Esta muy bien lograda la estetica de pokemon... pero tiene varios problemas... El primero que solo esta en ingles... El segundo trata sobre las 2 aventuras, la primera tiene un bug cuando obtenes tu primer tuxemon... Se crashea sin mas... la segunda aventura esta plagada de texto largo y MOLESTO (sin mencionar que no entiendo nada de la aventura)
